description:
Low cut, high comfort. A comfortable, low-cut version of Hanwag's classic Banks hiking boot made of high-quality nubuck and suede leather. The combination of reinforced PU foam wedge and high-quality footbed offers good cushioning and soft roll-off performance.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Banks Low GTX - Mens
